original_text:
The Lord has taken away your punishment,
    he has turned back your enemy.
The Lord, the King of Israel, is with you;
    never again will you fear any harm.
korean_text: 여호와가 네 형벌을 제거하였고 네 원수를 쫓아냈으며 이스라엘 왕 여호와가 네 가운데 계시니 네가 다시는 화를 당할까 두려워하지 아니할 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has taken away your punishment
he has turned back your enemy
The Lord, the King of Israel
never again will you fear any harm
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 어떤 해도 두려워하지 않을 것이다
